github.description: A query builder for PostgreSQL, MySQL and SQLite3, designed to be flexible, portable, and fun to use.
github.name: knex

registrynpmjs.name: knex
registrynpmjs.description: A batteries-included SQL query & schema builder for Postgres, MySQL and SQLite3 and the Browser

scripts.release:patch: git checkout master && export KNEX_DEV=0 && npm run-script test && npm run-script doc && git add . && git commit -m 'docs prep for release' && grunt release:patch
scripts.release:minor: git checkout master && export KNEX_DEV=0 && npm run-script test && npm run-script doc && git add . && git commit -m 'docs prep for release' && grunt release:minor

0.6.0.name: knex
0.6.0.description: A batteries-included SQL query & schema builder for Postgres, MySQL and SQLite3 and the Browser

scripts.release:patch: npm run jshint && npm test && gulp build && gulp release --type patch
scripts.release:minor: npm run jshint && npm test && gulp build && gulp release --type minor
